DESCRIPTION: Bang is a #b2 cost Attack that benefits from Wiz.
Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
Pinpricks are #b0 cost Attack cards which draw a card.
Switch places with another character. Does nothing if there is no valid target.
Wards are #b0 cost Skill cards which grant #yBlock and Exhaust.
Whiz is a #b1 cost Skill that grants Wiz.
When you have at least three stacks of Wiz, attacks will consume all stacks to deal 10 additional damage.
